column4: Hey all, if I were to install Ubuntu for '64, will I be able to pull 32-bit packages out of the repository without too much of a hassle?
Not really. Best bet for the moment is to install the i386 branch.
Thanks, I'll prolly end up doing that.
I'm still running the 64bit version here, but once I finish moving house, I'm cross-downgrading to i386.
